title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Who is it, lover?

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: It's my former husband, who I had forgotten all about.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Ooooo.  Well, sir, let me shake your hand. I'm proud to meet the man whose wife I'm currently sticking it to every night.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: So youÂ… remarried.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Yes, Lorry.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Larry!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Uhlarry. Larry-y, you disap - peared. I waited for you to come home for over three days! I. I remember how cold and lonely the nights got. By the fourth day I knew: I had to move on.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Didn't anybody send out a search party?

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: We did, Larry. We looked all afternoon. But we found nothing, no trace.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Please, Leslie, I don't know where else to go. I'm confused.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Leslie, I'm with Buck now.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: You're Leslie.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Right. I'm with Buck now. We have children together.  Calvin is eight, and little Buck is 13. I just can't up and leave them. I'm sorry.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: I'm sorry, too. I'll leave you alone. Eight and thirteen?

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Stan's house. He and Cartman are out in the backyard. Cartman is dressed as an outback hunter

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Well, I don't see any crocs out here.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Damnit, Cartman, you're supposed to be helping me to get ready to fight Kyle, not playing Australian outback guy!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Or, in other words, I'll let this jagu-ar bop me in the face and see if it hurts. Come on, jagu-ar, let's see what you've got!  Aaah! Ow, son of a bitch!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: You suck as a best friend, Cartman!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: You son of a bitch cat!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: What are you doing, Gorak!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: I can't live in your time. I'm freezing myself again.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Wow, that sucks, dude.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Tell me about it. I've been doing this for over three and a half hours now, and only my toes are starting to ice over.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Steve, wait!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: What are you doing here, dick?! We're not supposed to fight until 4 o'clock!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: I've got something to show Steve, dick!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Gorak is busy freezing himself again, dick!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Steve, you don't have to freeze yourself. Look!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: What is that?

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: It's this place called Des Moines. It's like, lost in time, see?  Everybody looks like you do.  Fashion is two years behind, Technology is two years behind, fads, are two years behind, just like you.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Home.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Come on, Steve, you're going to Des Moines!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Oh, no you don't, glory-monger! Gorak is my respnosibility. I'll take him to Des Moines!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: No you don't, butthole!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: They're coming for me!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Come on!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Yeah, you jagu-ars can be real mean. I'm gonna have to smack it in the face.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Was the ice man here?

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: He might have been, by crikey.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: We have to get him back. Well, can you do it?

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Sure I can! I can hunt down anything!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Wow! Kick ass!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: South Park Train Station. People are waiting to depart, and a train is pulling in

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: We need a one-way ticket to Des Moines, please.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Des Moines? What the hell for?

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: We have to get our friend, Steve-

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: My friend, Gorak!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: -to Des Moines, or else he's gonna melt away.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: No, he's not gonna melt away! That's Frosty, you stupid butthole!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Frosty, Steve, whatever.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Well, okay. Uh, I'll find him a seat.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Dude, look, it's 4 o'clock.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Oh. We'll wait for you over there, Steve. We have to start fighting now.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Okay, boys. Thanks.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Okay. First one to die, loses.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Okay.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: O-okay.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: So, here we go.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: 'K

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Go.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: The woods. The Aussie leads Mephesto, Agents, Barbrady, and other cops, in a hunt. He runs across a set of tracks

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Wait a second.  I think he came through here recently.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Yeah, I think the same thing.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Well, where the hell is he? We've got to get him back to the lab.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: He can't function out here in our time!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Calm down, calm down.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Yeah, calm down, calm down, you sons of bitches.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Wait! Look!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Is it him?

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: No! It's a Rocky Mountain rattle snake. This is the most poisonous snake in this entire region.  Now, what I'm gonna do, is carefully sneak up on him, and jam my thumb up his butthole. Crikey! Oh, this snake is really pissed!! I'm gonna jam my thumb in his butthole now! Awww, yeah, that pissed it off all right!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Does he always do this?

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Yeah,

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: I'm gonna go jam my thumb in some'in's butthole now.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: the train station. Stan and Kyle are still fighting

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Ow!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Ow!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Watch my coat, dude.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Oh.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: I got my ticket.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Huh?

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: I have to go to Platform B.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Oh. Okay, it's over this way

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: The trail ends here.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: The train station? Then he's trying to go somewhere.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Have you seen a man who looks similar to us, but with a thicker brow and an apish nose?

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: What the hell are you talking about?

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: An ice man, a man from the past. We must find him. Now, where is he?!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Platform B. Larry has gotten on the train, and the boys see him off. They get back to fighting

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Well, this is it. I'm going back to my time. Thanks again, boys.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: No problem, Gorak.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Later.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: You boys have really shown me the true meanng of friendship. You didn't care about anythng but my happiness. You put me in front of yourselves, and that's what real friendship is all about.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Yup.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Uhuh.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: After being frozen, I've learned that all a person has in life is family. And friends. If you lose those, you have nothing. So friends are to be treasured, more than anything in the world!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Right on.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Cool.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Goodbye, boys. Goodbye, friends!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Where is he? Where is Steve?!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: HisÂ… nameÂ… isÂ… Gorak!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: His nameÂ… is Steve!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: The train!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: We've got to stop it!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: No worries.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Let's get him!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: No!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: The hunting party is now on the tracks chasing the train.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: We've gotta stop that train!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Come back here, you!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Steve! Steve, look out!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: They're after you!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Oh, he's a wily one!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Oh, poo!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Steve, look out!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Notice the dilated pupils of this prehistoric man. A sure sign the prey is frightened. As well as he should be, as I will now jam my thumb up his butthole.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Huh?  Whah?!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Stop the train!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Hey, who are you?

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: I said, stop that train!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Yes, hello. I see you.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: They're all movin' pretty fast, but I'll catch up to 'em, by crikey.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: atop the train, Larry and the Aussie wrestle.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: I've got you pinned. I win.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Now I've got you pinned. I win!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Whoa!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Hey, it's okay! The helicopter is here! Go get him, boys!  Cut him off!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Nooo!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Now for the coup de gras. I'll justÂ… get myÂ… thumb upÂ… here.

text: Oohh!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: the helicopter lands in front of the train, but the train rolls on

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Aah, the train's not stopping.  It's not stopping!  AAAAAAAA!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Holy bum-!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Where's Gorak??

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Wow, that is the God-damnedest thing I've ever seen.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Where's the ice man?!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: He has to be around here somewhere.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: I can't believe he's gone.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Wait, look! The helicopter!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Hey!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: He's alive!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Good-bye again! I'm off to Des Moines!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: No! Come back! You can't get out! You'll never live!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: I'm not living here! Living is having ups and downs and sharing them with friends!  Thank you, Stan and Kyle! See ya!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Damn! Well, so much for our plan to use the ice man to take over Sweden.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: What?!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: What? Nothing!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Kyle, Steve was aÂ… pretty good name for that guy.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: No- Dude, Gorak is cool because it's original. And besides, you found him.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Be very very quiet. I'm hunting crocodiles, hahahahahaha.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Could we be best friends again?  I hate having Cartman as a best friend.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Me, too. He sucks.

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Oh yeah?! Well I don't need you guys anyways! You guys can kiss my-  Aha! There's a king croc right there!  And what I'm gonna do, is I'm gonna sneak up on it, and jam my thumb in its-

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Moo!

title: PREHISTORIC ICE MAN
text: Ey! Ey, get me out of here! God-damnit! Ugh. Smells like Kenny's house in here.
